title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

trailer.description: Darkness descends in Alfonso Cuarón's visionary take on the Wizarding World

summary: Harry's third year takes a dark turn when the infamous Sirius Black escapes Azkaban prison, allegedly to hunt him down. As soul-sucking Dementors patrol Hogwarts' grounds, new Defense Against the Dark Arts professor Remus Lupin teaches Harry the Patronus Charm to repel them. Mysteries multiply - why does the Whomping Willow violently lash out? What connects Lupin, Black, and the traitor Peter Pettigrew? And why does Harry keep seeing a spectral black dog, an omen of death? The truth explodes when Harry discovers Ron's rat Scabbers is actually Pettigrew in hiding - the real traitor who framed Sirius. In a heart-stopping climax at the Shrieking Shack, time itself bends as Harry and Hermione use a Time-Turner to rescue Sirius from Dementors and Buckbeak the hippogriff from execution. The film ends with Harry receiving his first true family connection - a godfather in Sirius - while learning even heroes like his father had shadows.
